name: Dr. Emily Carter
title: Veterinary Surgeon
about: Dr. Emily is a certified veterinary surgeon specializing in small animal surgery and preventive care. She believes in stress-free treatment and has helped hundreds of pets live healthier lives.

name: Dr. Rita H. Lewis
title: Animal Nutrition Specialist
about: Dr. Rajesh focuses on developing personalized diet plans for cats and dogs. His balanced nutrition programs have improved the wellbeing of many pets suffering from obesity and digestion issues.

name: Dr. Sarah Thompson
title: Pet Behavior Consultant
about: Dr. Sarah specializes in animal psychology and behavior correction. She helps pet owners understand their pets better and resolve issues like anxiety, aggression, and training difficulties.
